title: Le château de mes rêves
overview: Who has never dreamed of castle life? 7 families without personal fortune have taken the plunge and have become castellans! But this dream has a price, and these new kind of lords have given up everything to change their lives and open guest rooms, organize weddings or set up prodigious events, the only way for them to finance and maintain their exceptional areas! Come and share the extraordinary daily life of these new squires!
